ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: 0h

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: This is a monthly seminar that brings in modelers from many different concentrations. These talks are consistently the most engaging, thought-provoking seminars across my experience at YSPH. Even people not enrolled in the modeling concentration can and do attend the talks.
Great seminar to learn about the modeling in public health.
Good!
Very unorganized, difficult to know if we actually had seminar based on the dates provided at the beginning of the semester.
good to know latest information in modeling
Good seminar series on healthcare modeling.
Great seminar speakers. My only complaint would be to let us know when seminars are going to be cancelled.
The seminars were interesting but communication about the events and when they are cancelled needs to be made more clear.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: A David Paltiel  Great introduction to each guest lecturer.
Instructor: A David Paltiel  Good
Instructor: A David Paltiel  Unorganized.
Instructor: A David Paltiel  nice
Instructor: A David Paltiel  David is helpful and a good organizer for this course.
Instructor: A David Paltiel  Great facilitator for this seminar! Sad to see him be on sabbatical next year.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I always recommend these seminars to others! Free lunch and interesting talks.
Great seminar
They bring in great speakers from various fields of modeling.
Good
Great speakers, especially if interested in modeling concentration.
yes, nice
It seemed a bit disorganized, but each speaker brought interesting aspects!
Will recommend it to fellow students.
Requirement for modeling seminar. Useful to attend to see what you can do with modeling (health care policy related, infectious disease related etc.)
